title: r/Prorevenge I Got My R*cist Landlord FIRED!
description: r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP moves into a new apartment with his girlfriend, who's a black woman. They set up a meeting with the apartment manager, who immediately gives the couple attitude and even makes some racially charged remarks about OP and his girlfriend. OP decides that he's not going to take this laying down, so he enacts some prorevenge to destroy his career!
